title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin reacts to the surprising news that Bruce Arians is stepping down as head coach of the Buccaneers and what role Tom Brady played in that decision. He points out the one way a once glorious NBA franchise can remake themselves into championship contenders once again. He also believes Brady's decision to leave the Patriots and Bill Belichick is still having ripple effects across the league years later. Plus, former offensive lineman Rich Ohrnberger joins the show to explain his reports about the rift between Arians and Brady.
